content: I show you my stuff with DM Scotty hey guys DM Scotty here good to have you
with me today I'm going to talk about a little trap in cat / encounter I had in
my dungeon cave which was a kind of a this doppelganger that would absorb the
abilities of the player characters so let's go to the table one I'll talk
about that so here's really all there was to the trap you know / encounter I
had this doppelganger creature which was just really would it consume their
abilities and then could fight them so I'll give you a look at this thing so I
got this this is an excellent kind of like mouth warmed and half-formed and I
thought it was a really cool model for this encounter there we go I did do some
modification to it because I had pretty obvious scenes so I did some stuff on
the back in the arm the arms and the waist and that kind of thing but I think
he came out really cool now the second part of this is the this well okay and
this was kind of the the primal juice that formed this that formed this
critter alright now let me explain how I constructed this is just cardboard okay
you can see it does have texture around the edge so I did this like I did the
well in the well video the truck well video but I just took some of that
texture paper that I made from the cake molds and applied it to the well I also
did a little bit of hot glue around the edge to kind of hide the seam there but
yeah I think that came out really nice now if we look inside you can see I did
kind of a like a mix of kind of like primal use I guess I would call it where
this thing came out of but if you look closely
you can see the hot glue on there also so what I did for this was I painted
that kind of primal who's in the well and then I did the hot glue on top of it
so that was a nice way to get that kind of look to the use without trying to
paint it on top of the hot glue and the hot glue essentially just gave it kind
of some texture on the top but it also gave it like a sheen like it also made a
look wet so I kind of like that so this was unlike my normal technique where I
all paint directly on the hot glue this was this was painted under the hot glue
and then the hot glue is put on top so I think that's a really nice technique and
can be used for a lot of things I'm gonna start experimenting with
experimenting with that in the future okay so that's that's the well it
couldn't be easier and what I'm going to do now is go to the table and I have
some pics from the session out I'll talk about those
you can see on this tile there was a tunnel a pit that the players had
crawled up from and they're on a Ledge now and you actually haven't applied the
other bigger tile tile because there's a Ledge there by the by the players and
they're fighting some imps that have been assaulting them throughout the
layer and the imps have been getting samples of their flesh to make this
doppelganger trap so two of them had already it sampled there two of their
flesh what I had it was that if the IMP escaped then it took the flesh but if
they killed it before it got away then it wouldn't escape with it so it had
already escaped with two of their of the flesh
so one last player character got got a sample taken in this encounter just
before the doppelganger encounter so that wasn't good for them so now we'll
move on to the main encounter so here is a scale that cliff in the
back it's about a 15 foot drop there's a 15 foot incline or cliff on the other
side also and you can see that the the Imps have lined up to watch this fight
so when the players climb down this doppelganger forms in the center of this
pool and the well that's in the center of the room the players have been have
had their flesh stolen also realized they recognize something into the end of
this creature when they look in his eyes something of them is reflecting back at
them so kind of a clue that this is a that's stolen their abilities
as the battle kicks off and they start casting spells at it they realize
they're in trouble because the doppelganger casts the same spells back
so mechanically that made it very easy to run this thing because I didn't have
to have all the abilities of the player characters that it stole basically it
essentially it just would cast or use the abilities of the people that had had
stolen their abilities so if someone uses a certain attack it would use the
same attack back it could use it against another character or the same character
but essentially it'd be using it back and if the healer healed somebody in the
party it could heal itself so yeah pretty nasty encounter you can also see
that there are some traps that have popped up around the room these swirling
blades so yeah just to put more fuel on the fire
it quickly becomes apparent how dangerous this creature is because as
they fight it and use their own abilities it can use them back so not
only is it getting its own attack it's getting an attack anytime somebody it
has stolen the flesh from gets an attack so a pretty nasty creature with these
traps the players realize they can use a bit to their advantage and end up
pushing or pulling the thing into these traps to try to hurt it without using
special abilities that the creature can use on them
at this point the party is taking quite a beating and the warrior goes for broke
and gets the creature in a chokehold and rolls really well and we roll oppose
checks and I went for three rounds of opposed checks and the warrior won every
time and this thing wasn't a wimp I mean it was pretty strong but I just rolled
horribly so the the war ends up choking it out and that's how they kill it so it
was a pretty cool resolution to this now the imps at the end of the room they
don't seem to do anything when they kill the doppelganger and when the players
scale the cliff the imps just kind of oh and just kind of move aside and let the
players pass if you've watched my other videos and you've seen my dragon
skeleton video actually the dragon was dead they were trying to go to the
dragon's lair to ask it for a scale and it was dead so at this point they end up
going in one of the there's three caves and they go through the caves and the
one of them has the Dragons skeleton minute so the dragon wasn't even alive
it was actually killed by another dragon they discover from the clues of its
corpse so yeah they go through this whole trap Laden lair to ask it for
scales to help with this quest but since it was a silver dragon and it's dead but
lucky for them there are still some scales around the lot around the lair
cater so they end up getting them anyway so pretty cool encounter
